content: Authenticator application configuration will be reset.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when resetting an authenticator application's configuration. It appears in a modal dialog and serves as a warning or notification to the user about the upcoming action.

usage.context:
return (
 <ModalDialog isLoading={!tReady} visible={visible} onClose={onClose}>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("ResetApplicationTitle")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <Text>{t("ResetApplicationDescription")}</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 key="ResetSendBtn"
 label={t("Common:ResetApplication")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Autentifikasiya üçün tətbiq sıfırlanacaq' is not a direct or accurate translation of 'Authenticator application configuration will be reset'.  'Autentifikasiya üçün' translates to 'for authentication', which isn't quite right. It implies the app is being reset *for* authentication, not that the authentication app itself is being reset. A more accurate translation would convey that the authenticator application is being reset.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Authenticator application's configuration is going to be reset. A more literal translation could be 'Authenticator tətbiqinin konfiqurasiyası sıfırlanacaq' or 'Authenticator tətbiqi sıfırlanacaq.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Los ajustes de aplicación para autenticación se resetearán' is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Spanish. 'Ajustes de aplicación para autenticación' is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La configuración de la aplicación de autenticación se restablecerá.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '인증자 애플리케이션 구성이 리셋됩니다' while technically understandable, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'Authenticator application configuration will be reset.'  '인증 애플리케이션' (Injeung aeplleukeon) would be more accurate and standard terminology for 'Authenticator application'. '초기화됩니다' (chogihwadoemnida) is a more natural way to say 'will be reset' in this context, implying a return to default settings.

The translation 'ද්වි-සාධක යෙදුමේ වින්‍යාසය යළි සැකසෙනු ඇත' translates to 'Authenticator application configuration will be re-arranged'. While not entirely incorrect, 're-arranged' is less precise than 'reset'. 'Reset' implies a return to a default or initial state, which is more accurate for authenticator app configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ද්වි-සාධක යෙදුමේ වින්‍යාසය යළි පිහිටුවනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Конфигурација за аутентификациону апликацију ће да буде ресетована' is a bit wordy and not the most natural way to express 'Authenticator application configuration will be reset.' The phrase 'ће да буде' (will be) can be shortened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигурација аутентификационе апликације ће бити ресетована.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Konfiguracija za autentifikacionu aplikaciju će da bude resetovana' is overly verbose and doesn't convey the concise meaning of the English original. The phrase 'će da bude resetovana' is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfiguracija autentifikacione aplikacije će biti resetovana.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the use of 'za autentifikacionu aplikaciju' can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfiguracija autentifikacione aplikacije će biti resetovana.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Буде скинута конфігурація програми автентифікації' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Ukrainian. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'Конфігурація програми автентифікації буде скинута' or 'Налаштування програми автентифікації буде скинуто'.
